articles.author: IANS
articles.title: 1st T20I: Jemimah’s Unbeaten Fifty Goes in Vain as India Lose to SA by 12 Runs - The Quint
articles.description: After dominating the ODI series and one-off Test, the Indian women's cricket team went down to South Africa by 12 runs in the first T20I of the three-match series at the M.A Chidambaram Stadium on Friday.
articles.content: Brits and Kapp then came together for a 96-run partnership for the second wicket, taking the score into three figures. They were also helped by the Indians dropping a few chances. Brits completed her… [+419 chars]
